content: the henry hat is a versatile simple cable pattern worked in the round from the bottom edge to the crown the pattern is an 11 stitch repeat and the cable is a 6 row repeat so it s easy to scale up or down yarn options - one skein dk weight 100g yarn held double child/medium adult - two skeins dk weight 100g yarn held double large adult - one skein each dk weight 100g yarn and one skein mohair or suri silk held double all sizes - two skeins chunky weight 100g knit with single strand all sizes
